description: Spacious alcove studio with 10 foot high ceilings. 3 large windows facing the street with sunny southern exposure. Newly renovated modern bathroom and kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Located in the heart of Fort Greene. 1 block from Fort Greene Park. 2 minute walk to the C and G trains and an 8 minute walk to Atlantic Terminal with a number of other train lines (2,3, 4, 5, B, D, N, R, Q, and LIRR). 10 minutes on the train to downtown Manhattan.
name: Loft Studio in Heart of Fort Greene
review: Randi was very accommodating & her adorable apartment is in the perfect location in Fort Greene - central to everything! Highly recommend Walters around the corner. Thanks again for a great stay!
